con:testCase.name: CreditorUpdate_IBAN_AllFields
con:testCase.con:description:
CreditorUpdate Request for IBAN Account
Description related to Steps :
DB Properties : Database connection string for different environments Properties : Test Data for Predefined API's to ferform action DB Connection : Set the connection string based on the environment selected to execute

con:request.name: Authorization
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21" xmlns:urn="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentauthorization:v1_3" xmlns:urn1="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:paymentauthorization:v1_3" xmlns:urn2="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:authorization:v1_3"> <soapenv:Header> <wsc:AutHeader> <wsc:SourceApplication>${Properties#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication> <wsc:DestinationApplication>PIN</wsc:DestinationApplication> <wsc:Function>paymentAuthorizationCreate</wsc:Function> <wsc:Version>V2.0</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>${Properties#userid}</wsc:userid> <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials> <wsc:channel>${Properties#channel}</wsc:channel> <wsc:orgid>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgid> <wsc:orgunit>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgunit> <wsc:customerid>${Properties#customerid}</wsc:customerid> <wsc:locale xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip> <wsc:item value="${Properties#value1}" key="${Properties#item1}"/> <wsc:item value="${Properties#value2}" key="${Properties#item2}"/> <wsc:item value="${Properties#value3}" key="${Properties#item3}"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:PaymentAuthorizationCreateRequest> <urn:cpsAuthorizationMessage> <urn1:cpsUserAuthorizationData> <urn2:agreementData> <urn2:agreementId>${Properties#agreementid}</urn2:agreementId> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:bankId>${Properties#orgid}</urn2:bankId> <urn2:customerID>${Properties#customerid}</urn2:customerID> <urn2:productID>10</urn2:productID> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:migrationDate>2018-03-05+05:00</urn2:migrationDate> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <urn2:corporateGrouping> <urn2:customerId>${Properties#customerid}</urn2:customerId> <urn2:agreementId>${Properties#agreementid}</urn2:agreementId> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:parentAgreementId>1234567</urn2:parentAgreementId> <urn2:b2bPollingEnabled>false</urn2:b2bPollingEnabled> </urn2:corporateGrouping> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <urn2:agreementAccount> <urn2:accountNumber>${Properties#debitAccount}</urn2:accountNumber> <urn2:accountOwnerIdentifier>${Properties#customerid}</urn2:accountOwnerIdentifier> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:currencyCode>${Properties#CreditorCurrency}</urn2:currencyCode> <urn2:accountType>CoreAccount</urn2:accountType> <urn2:numberOfVerifiers>0</urn2:numberOfVerifiers> <urn2:numberOfApprovers>0</urn2:numberOfApprovers> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:psd2Configuration>BOTH</urn2:psd2Configuration> <urn2:access>CREDIT_AND_DEBIT</urn2:access> </urn2:agreementAccount> </urn2:agreementData> <urn2:userData> <urn2:userId>${Properties#UserID}</urn2:userId> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:sessionID>${=java.util.UUID.randomUUID().toString().substring(0,30)}</urn2:sessionID> <urn2:firstName>TestCorpFirst</urn2:firstName> <urn2:lastName>TestCorpLast</urn2:lastName> <!--Optional:--> <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->
<urn2:userAccount> <urn2:accountNumber>${Properties#debitAccount}</urn2:accountNumber> <urn2:role>View</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Register</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Appprove</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Salary</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Transfer</urn2:role> <urn2:bookingLevel>D</urn2:bookingLevel> <urn2:approvalLimit>10000</urn2:approvalLimit> <urn2:registerLimit>10000</urn2:registerLimit> </urn2:userAccount> </urn2:userData> </urn1:cpsUserAuthorizationData> </urn:cpsAuthorizationMessage> </urn:PaymentAuthorizationCreateRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: CreditorCreate
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21" xmlns:urn="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:ws:paymentcreditor:v1" xmlns:urn1="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:predefinedcreditor:v1" xmlns:urn2="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v1"> <soapenv:Header> <wsc:AutHeader> <wsc:SourceApplication>${Properties#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication> <wsc:DestinationApplication>PIN</wsc:DestinationApplication> <wsc:Function>paymentAuthorizationCreate</wsc:Function> <wsc:Version>1.0</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>${Properties#UserID}</wsc:userid> <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials> <wsc:channel>${Properties#channel}</wsc:channel> <wsc:orgid>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgid> <wsc:customerid>${Properties#customerid}</wsc:customerid> <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip> <wsc:item value="${Properties#value1}" key="${Properties#item1}"/> <wsc:item value="${Properties#value2}" key="${Properties#item2}"/> <wsc:item value="${Properties#value3}" key="${Properties#item3}"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:CreditorCreateRequest> <urn:creditorInformation> <urn1:type>INTERNATIONAL</urn1:type> <urn1:currencyCode>${Properties#CreditorCurrency}</urn1:currencyCode> <urn1:creditorAccount>${Properties#CreditAccountNumber}</urn1:creditorAccount> <urn1:creditor> <urn2:name>Creditor</urn2:name> <urn2:postalAddress> <urn2:addressType>ADDR</urn2:addressType> <urn2:country>${Properties#CreditorCountry}</urn2:country> <urn2:addressLine>ngh</urn2:addressLine> <!--0 to 7 repetitions:--> </urn2:postalAddress> </urn1:creditor> <urn1:ultimateCreditor> <urn2:name>Cred</urn2:name> <urn2:postalAddress> <urn2:addressType>DLVY</urn2:addressType> <urn2:department>Test</urn2:department> <urn2:subDepartment>Test</urn2:subDepartment> <urn2:streetName>Test</urn2:streetName> <urn2:buildingNumber>1234</urn2:buildingNumber> <urn2:postCode>91052</urn2:postCode> <urn2:townName>Erlangen</urn2:townName> <urn2:countrySubDivision>Test9</urn2:countrySubDivision> <urn2:country>${Properties#CreditorCountry}</urn2:country> <!--0 to 7 repetitions:--> </urn2:postalAddress> </urn1:ultimateCreditor> <urn1:creditorAgent> <urn2:bic>${Properties#CreditorAgent}</urn2:bic> <urn2:postalAddress> <urn2:country>${Properties#CreditorCountry}</urn2:country> <!--0 to 7 repetitions:--> </urn2:postalAddress> </urn1:creditorAgent> <urn1:supplierNumber>${=Math.abs(new Random().nextInt() % 6000000) + 1}</urn1:supplierNumber> </urn:creditorInformation> </urn:CreditorCreateRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: CreditorUpdate
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21" xmlns:urn="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:ws:paymentcreditor:v1" xmlns:urn1="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:predefinedcreditor:v1" xmlns:urn2="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v1">\r <soapenv:Header>\r <wsc:AutHeader>\r <wsc:SourceApplication>${Properties#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication>\r <wsc:DestinationApplication>PIN</wsc:DestinationApplication>\r <wsc:Function>paymentAuthorizationCreate</wsc:Function>\r <wsc:Version>1.0</wsc:Version>\r <wsc:ClientContext>\r <wsc:userid>${Properties#UserID}</wsc:userid>\r <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials>\r <wsc:channel>${Properties#channel}</wsc:channel>\r <wsc:orgid>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgid>\r <wsc:customerid>${Properties#customerid}</wsc:customerid>\r <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip>\r <wsc:item value="${Properties#value1}" key="${Properties#item1}"/>\r <wsc:item value="${Properties#value2}" key="${Properties#item2}"/>\r <wsc:item value="${Properties#value3}" key="${Properties#item3}"/>\r </wsc:ClientContext>\r </wsc:AutHeader>\r </soapenv:Header>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <urn:CreditorUpdateRequest>\r <urn:creditorInformation>\r <urn1:alias>INT Creditor</urn1:alias>\r <urn1:type>INTERNATIONAL</urn1:type>\r <urn1:currencyCode>${Properties#CreditorCurrency}</urn1:currencyCode>\r <urn1:creditorAccount>${Properties#CreditAccountNumber}</urn1:creditorAccount>\r <urn1:creditor>\r <urn2:name>Creditor</urn2:name>\r <urn2:postalAddress>\r <urn2:addressType>ADDR</urn2:addressType>\r <urn2:department>test1</urn2:department>\r <urn2:subDepartment>test1</urn2:subDepartment>\r <urn2:streetName>test1</urn2:streetName>\r <urn2:buildingNumber>321</urn2:buildingNumber>\r <urn2:postCode>71092</urn2:postCode>\r <urn2:townName>test1</urn2:townName>\r <urn2:countrySubDivision>test1</urn2:countrySubDivision>\r <urn2:country>${Properties#CreditorCountry}</urn2:country>\r <urn2:addressLine>Credadr7</urn2:addressLine>\r <urn2:addressLine>Credadr1</urn2:addressLine>\r <urn2:addressLine>Credadr2</urn2:addressLine>\r <urn2:addressLine>Credadr3</urn2:addressLine>\r <urn2:addressLine>Credadr4</urn2:addressLine>\r <urn2:addressLine>Credadr5</urn2:addressLine>\r <urn2:addressLine>Credadr6</urn2:addressLine>\r <!--0 to 7 repetitions:-->\r </urn2:postalAddress>\r </urn1:creditor>\r <urn1:ultimateCreditor>\r <urn2:name>Cred</urn2:name>\r <urn2:postalAddress>\r <urn2:addressType>DLVY</urn2:addressType>\r <urn2:department>Test</urn2:department>\r <urn2:subDepartment>Test</urn2:subDepartment>\r <urn2:streetName>Test</urn2:streetName>\r <urn2:buildingNumber>1234</urn2:buildingNumber>\r <urn2:postCode>91052</urn2:postCode>\r <urn2:townName>Erlangen</urn2:townName>\r <urn2:countrySubDivision>Test9</urn2:countrySubDivision>\r <urn2:country>${Properties#CreditorCountry}</urn2:country>\r <!--0 to 7 repetitions:-->\r </urn2:postalAddress>\r </urn1:ultimateCreditor>\r <urn1:creditorAgent>\r <urn2:bic>${Properties#CreditorAgent}</urn2:bic>\r <urn2:name>${Properties#AgentName}</urn2:name>\r <urn2:postalAddress>\r <urn2:addressType>PBOX</urn2:addressType>\r <urn2:department>test1</urn2:department>\r <urn2:subDepartment>test1</urn2:subDepartment>\r <urn2:streetName>test1</urn2:streetName>\r <urn2:buildingNumber>test1</urn2:buildingNumber>\r <urn2:postCode>71092</urn2:postCode>\r <urn2:townName>test1</urn2:townName>\r <urn2:countrySubDivision>test1</urn2:countrySubDivision>\r <urn2:country>${Properties#CreditorCountry}</urn2:country>\r <urn2:addressLine>AgentAdr1</urn2:addressLine>\r <urn2:addressLine>AgentAdr2</urn2:addressLine>\r <urn2:addressLine>AgentAdr3</urn2:addressLine>\r <urn2:addressLine>AgentAdr4</urn2:addressLine>\r <urn2:addressLine>AgentAdr5</urn2:addressLine>\r <urn2:addressLine>AgentAdr6</urn2:addressLine>\r <urn2:addressLine>AgentAdr7</urn2:addressLine>\r <!--0 to 7 repetitions:-->\r </urn2:postalAddress>\r </urn1:creditorAgent>\r <urn1:supplierNumber>${Properties#supplierNumber}</urn1:supplierNumber>\r <urn1:intermediaryAgent1> <urn2:bic>${Properties#IntermediaryAgent3}</urn2:bic> <urn2:name>Swedbank AB</urn2:name> <urn2:postalAddress> <urn2:addressType>ADDR</urn2:addressType> <urn2:department>Brunkerbergstorg</urn2:department> <urn2:subDepartment>test1</urn2:subDepartment> <urn2:streetName>test2</urn2:streetName> <urn2:buildingNumber>test3</urn2:buildingNumber> <urn2:postCode>10534</urn2:postCode> <urn2:townName>Stockholm</urn2:townName> <urn2:countrySubDivision>test</urn2:countrySubDivision> <urn2:country>${Properties#CreditorCountry}</urn2:country> <urn2:addressLine>Brunkerbergstorg</urn2:addressLine> <urn2:addressLine>10534</urn2:addressLine> <urn2:addressLine>Stockholm</urn2:addressLine> <urn2:addressLine>Swedbank AB</urn2:addressLine> <urn2:addressLine>DE</urn2:addressLine> </urn2:postalAddress> </urn1:intermediaryAgent1> <urn1:intermediaryAgent2> <urn2:bic>${Properties#IntermediaryAgent2}</urn2:bic> <urn2:name>COMMERZBANK AG (FORMERLY DRESDNER BANK AG)</urn2:name> <urn2:postalAddress> <urn2:addressType>DLVY</urn2:addressType> <urn2:department>COMMERZBANK</urn2:department> <urn2:subDepartment>AG</urn2:subDepartment> <urn2:streetName>FORMERLY</urn2:streetName> <urn2:buildingNumber>2131</urn2:buildingNumber> <urn2:postCode>50450</urn2:postCode> <urn2:townName>KOELN</urn2:townName> <urn2:countrySubDivision>DRESDNER</urn2:countrySubDivision> <urn2:country>${Properties#CreditorCountry}</urn2:country> <urn2:addressLine>COMMERZBANK</urn2:addressLine> <urn2:addressLine>FORMERLY</urn2:addressLine> <urn2:addressLine>AG</urn2:addressLine> <urn2:addressLine>KOELN</urn2:addressLine> <urn2:addressLine>DRESDNER</urn2:addressLine> <urn2:addressLine>DE</urn2:addressLine> </urn2:postalAddress> </urn1:intermediaryAgent2> <urn1:intermediaryAgent3> <urn2:bic>${Properties#IntermediaryAgent1}</urn2:bic> <urn2:name>COMMERZBANK AG</urn2:name> <urn2:postalAddress> <urn2:addressType>ADDR</urn2:addressType> <urn2:department>COMMERZBANK</urn2:department> <urn2:subDepartment>AG</urn2:subDepartment> <urn2:streetName>KAISERSTRASSE</urn2:streetName> <urn2:buildingNumber>324</urn2:buildingNumber> <urn2:postCode>60261</urn2:postCode> <urn2:townName>FRANKFURT</urn2:townName> <urn2:countrySubDivision>test</urn2:countrySubDivision> <urn2:country>${Properties#CreditorCountry}</urn2:country> <urn2:addressLine>KAISERSTRASSE</urn2:addressLine> <urn2:addressLine>FRANKFURT</urn2:addressLine> <urn2:addressLine>72061</urn2:addressLine> <urn2:addressLine>COMMERZBANK</urn2:addressLine> <urn2:addressLine>AG</urn2:addressLine> <urn2:addressLine>DE</urn2:addressLine> </urn2:postalAddress> </urn1:intermediaryAgent3> </urn:creditorInformation>\r <urn:predefinedCreditorId>${Properties#predefinedCreditorId}</urn:predefinedCreditorId>\r </urn:CreditorUpdateRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:config.con:query: select * from PDC_AGENT where FK_PREDEFINEDCREDITORID = '${Properties#predefinedCreditorId}' order by AGENTID asc

con:configuration.con:originalMessage: <Results> <ResultSet fetchSize="10"> <Row rowNumber="1"> <AGENTID>2100</AGENTID> <BICFI>COBADEFFXXX</BICFI> <MEMBERID/> <OTHERIDENTIFICATION/> <NAME>Nordea</NAME> <FK_PREDEFINEDCREDITORID>2159</FK_PREDEFINEDCREDITORID> <AGENTTYPE>CRAG</AGENTTYPE> </Row> <Row rowNumber="2"> <AGENTID>2101</AGENTID> <BICFI>HAWODEH1XXX</BICFI> <MEMBERID/> <OTHERIDENTIFICATION/> <NAME>Swedbank AB</NAME> <FK_PREDEFINEDCREDITORID>2159</FK_PREDEFINEDCREDITORID> <AGENTTYPE>IAG1</AGENTTYPE> </Row> <Row rowNumber="3"> <AGENTID>2102</AGENTID> <BICFI>DRESDEFF370</BICFI> <MEMBERID/> <OTHERIDENTIFICATION/> <NAME>COMMERZBANK AG (FORMERLY DRESDNER BANK AG)</NAME> <FK_PREDEFINEDCREDITORID>2159</FK_PREDEFINEDCREDITORID> <AGENTTYPE>IAG2</AGENTTYPE> </Row> <Row rowNumber="4"> <AGENTID>2103</AGENTID> <BICFI>GENODEFFXXX</BICFI> <MEMBERID/> <OTHERIDENTIFICATION/> <NAME>COMMERZBANK AG</NAME> <FK_PREDEFINEDCREDITORID>2159</FK_PREDEFINEDCREDITORID> <AGENTTYPE>IAG3</AGENTTYPE> </Row> </ResultSet> </Results>

con:config.con:query: select * from PDC_PARTY where FK_PREDEFINEDCREDITORID = '${Properties#predefinedCreditorId}' order by PARTYID asc
